backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, notes, syllabus, questions, and PDFs with CRUD operations, access control via MixinAuthorization, blob storage via MixinStorage, and migration support for adding PDF functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from OldActor (without PDFs) to NewActor (with PDFs) by initializing empty PDF storage and nextPDFId counter.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: admin PDF management interface, public PDF browsing interface, and React Query hooks for PDF CRUD operations with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and admin interfaces with descriptions of PDF management functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'BCA Notes Website', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for routes (notes, syllabus, PDFs, PYQ, admin), ThemeProvider, ProfileSetupModal for first-time users, and loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying shield alert icon, error message for non-admin users, and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/NoteForm.t: Form component for creating or editing notes with title, description, and content fields. Handles both create and update operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesManag: Admin interface for managing notes with list view, create/edit/delete actions, and confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/admin/PDFForm.ts: Form component for creating and editing PDF entries with file upload, subject selection, title, description fields, and validation for file type and size (max 10MB).
frontend/src/components/admin/PDFManager: Admin interface for managing PDFs with list view grouped by subject, upload/edit/delete actions, and confirmation dialogs for deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/PYQForm.ts: Form component for creating and editing previous year questions (PYQ) with fields for year, semester, subject, and question content.
frontend/src/components/admin/PYQManager: Admin interface for managing previous year questions with list view, create/edit/delete actions, and delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/SyllabusFo: Form component for creating and editing syllabus entries with semester, subject, dynamic topic list management, and course details fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/SyllabusMa: Admin component for managing syllabus entries with CRUD operations, displaying syllabuses in cards with semester badges, topics count, and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year, BCA Hub branding, and 'Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai' attribution with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with BCA Hub branding, navigation menu (Notes, Syllabus, PDFs, PYQ, Admin for admins), active route highlighting, and LoginButton integration.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component providing consistent page structure with Header at top, main content area in middle, and Footer at bottom.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states, error handling for already-authenticated users, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Displays a note card with title, description, and a 'View Details' button. Applies hover effects and triggers onClick callback.
Modal dialog that displays full note details including title, description, and scrollable content in a formatted view.
frontend/src/components/PDFCard.tsx: Card component for displaying PDF metadata with view and download buttons. Handles PDF blob creation and file operations.
frontend/src/components/PDFFilters.tsx: Filter component for PDFs with subject dropdown and clear filters button. Extracts unique subjects from PDF list.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time user profile setup that collects user name and saves it via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/PYQFilters.tsx: Filter component for previous year questions with year, semester, and subject dropdowns plus clear filters functionality.
frontend/src/components/PYQList.tsx: Displays questions grouped by year in descending order, showing semester and subject badges with question content in cards.
frontend/src/components/SyllabusAccordio: Accordion component displaying syllabus items grouped by semester, showing topics and course details for each subject.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, notes, syllabuses, questions, and PDFs with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom academic-themed color palette for both light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabbed interface for managing notes, syllabus, PDFs, and previous year questions, with admin access control.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Public-facing notes page with search functionality, displaying note cards in a grid layout with authentication-gated access and detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/PDFsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable grid of PDF resources organized by subject, with authentication check and loading states. Shows login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PYQPage.tsx: Renders previous year questions with filters for year, semester, and subject. Requires authentication and displays filtered question list or empty state.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusPage.tsx: Shows BCA syllabus organized by semester using an accordion component. Includes semester filter buttons and authentication requirement.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors (using OKLCH), fonts, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a BCA notes website with admin/user roles, password authentication, and features for managing notes, syllabus, PDFs, and previous year questions.
